name: integration-tests-jest

scripts.config-ambiente: copy /Y "configuracao-ambiente\config-ambiente.json" "C:\Ema Software\Contas ERP\" && copy /Y "configuracao-ambiente\configuracao-ambiente.txt" "C:\Ema Software\Contas ERP\configuracao-ambiente\" && copy /Y "configuracao-ambiente\config.json" "C:\Ema Software\Contas ERP\consul\"
scripts.ema-start: sc query ema_start | find "RUNNING" >nul || net start ema_start
scripts.before-test: npm run ema-stop && npm run init-docker && npm run reset-db && npm run config-ambiente && npm run ema-start
